message:
The Salinas River is currently flooding. Several guages are broken or inaccurate. Please stay clear of rising waters and stay safe.

Check [Monterey County Emeregency info](https://www.co.monterey.ca.us/government/departments-a-h/administrative-office/office-of-emergency-services/incidents/2023-winter-storm-atmospheric-river) and [SLO County emergency info](https://www.prepareslo.org/en/storms.aspx).
